texts.Beginner_Spell_Description: Your first magic spell. Enemy will be poisoned for 5 turns. Uses 50 mana Cooldown: 8 Turns
texts.Universal_Set_Description: Everything you need in one upgrade! Increases amount of Accuracy and Agility points by {0}
texts.More_Mana_Description: More mana makes you stronger. Adds 10 mana
texts.Now_Not_A_Beginner_Description: Your knowledge increases your power. Keep practicing
texts.Beginner_Damage_Description: Beginner Spell deals Player's base damage ignoring defence with {0}% chance
texts.Beginner_Mana_Description: Reduces Beginner Spell mana cost to {0}
texts.Beginner_Cooldown_Description: Reduces Beginner Spell cooldown to {0} turns
texts.Deadlier_Poison_Description: Makes Beginner Spell Poison stronger, now it lasts for 10 turns
texts.Mana_Overdrain_Description: Allows you to use spells that cost more mana than you have, but you won't be able to use magic items for 1 move per 10% of maximum mana over your maximum mana
texts.Mana_Overdrain_Percent_Description: Now you won't be able to use magic items for 1 move per {0}% of maximum mana over your maximum mana
texts.More_Effects_Description: Beginner Spell gains ability to weaken Enemy for 5 turns
texts.Perfect_Accuracy_Description: Beginner Spell will ignore Enemy's avoid chance hitting with 100% chance
texts.Mana_Overdrain_Potion_Description: Mana potions will decrease Mana Overdrain time by {0} turns per every potion used
texts.Additional_Slot_Description: Unlocks additional active skill slot. More active skills - more fun
texts.Damage_Resistance_Description: Increases your Damage Resistance by {0}%. Permanent Armor!
texts.Chaos_Description: Deals 1% of Enemy's health with Player's base damage. Can't be avoided. Uses 250 Mana Cooldown: 7 Turns
texts.Chaos_Damage_Description: Increases Chaos damage to {0}% of Enemy's health
texts.Stronger_Weakness_Description: Beginner Spell now weakens Enemy for 8 turns instead of 5
texts.Cheaper_Spells_Description: Reduses mana usage by {0}%. Less mana usage - more spells
texts.Skilled_Tree_Chance_Description: Increases Skilled Tree spawn chance by 1%. People say that Skilled Tree can give you something more powerful than Experience
texts.A_Lot_Of_Mana_Description: Even more mana for even more spells. Increases maximum mana amount by 20
texts.Faster_Attacks_Description: Increases your attack speed by 0.1(stamina bar fills faster)
texts.Chaos_Effect_Description: Now instead of dealing percent of enemy health damage Chaos applies debuff for 1-5 turns that gives you 0.5% damage to Enemy's health per debuff turn, but also Enemy has 9% avoid chance per debuff turn. Works only with Physical attacks!
texts.Vampirism_Heal_Description: Increases healing amount to {0}% of damage done
texts.Vampirism_Description: Deals 200% of Player's base damage, restores 10% of the damage done to Player's health. Uses 150 Mana Cooldown: 6 Turns
texts.Vampirism_Damage_Description: Increases Vampirism damage to {0}% of Player's base damage
texts.Chaos_Effect_Avoid_Chance_Description: Decreases Enemy's avoid chance per debuff turn to {0}%
texts.Chaos_Effect_Damage_Description: Increases damage to Enemy's health per debuff turn to {0}% of Enemy's health
texts.Chaos_Effect_Duration_Description: Increases Chaos debuff duration to {0} turns
texts.Ultimate_Unlock_Description: Unlocks last tier of upgrades, some of them allow you to upgrade active skills to even better Ultimate level
texts.Vampirism_Effect_Heal_Description: Increases healing power of Vampirism, after using vampirism you will restore {0}% of the damage done by debuffs
texts.Chaos_Ultimate_Percent_Description: Chaos debuff now deals damage based on maximum health insted of current, but it can also be used against you!
texts.Chaos_Ultimate_Random_Debuff_Description: Chaos, additionally to Chaos debuff, applies random debuff with random duration, sometimes
texts.Ultimate_Vampirism_Description: Vampirism makes the enemy bleed for 5 turns. Healing effect from debuffs is doubled
texts.Health_Regeneration_Description: Increases base health regeneration for {0}. Slightly overpriced permanent healing!
texts.Avoid_Chance_Description: Increases maximum avoid chance by {0}% Your current maximum avoid chance: {1}%
texts.More_Evasion_Description: Extra 3 agility points for a good price
texts.Precise_Hit_Unlock_Description: Most Precise Attack, hits the Enemy always
texts.Precise_Cooldown_Description: Reduces Precise Hit cooldown to {0} turns
texts.Parrying_Unlock_Description: Parrying allows you to avoid avery Enemy attack. Parry chance increases by 1% Every time you take damage
texts.Parrying_Chance_Description: Parrying chance increases every time you take damage by {0}%
texts.Painful_Parrying_Description: Parrying chance increases every time you take damage by {0}% of damage taken
texts.Precise_Enchants_Description: Precise Hit now have {0}% chance to trigger weapon enchant
texts.Max_Critical_Strike_Chance_Description: Increases maximum critical strike chance by {0}% Your current maximum critical strike chance: {1}%
texts.Block_Unlock_Description: Blocks incoming Enemy attack with 65% chance
texts.More_Accuracy_Description: Extra 3 accuracy points for a good price
texts.Brutality_Streak_Unlock_Description: Every successful attack icrease your damage by 1%. If Enemy blocks attack all extra damage will be lost. Enemy always have 8% avoid chance
texts.Energy_Saving_Description: Every successful attack saves more energy, increasing your damage by {0}%
texts.Brutality_Streak_Mob_Avoid_Chance_Descri: Permanent Enemy avoid chance decreased to {0}%
texts.Active_Skill_0_Description: Most Precise Attack, hits the Enemy always. Also Adds {0}% damage to normal attack and triggers weapon enchantment with {2}% chance. Cooldown: {1} Turns
texts.Active_Skill_3_Description: Allows you to Block Every attack during move with {1}% chance. If blocked attack, returns {0}% of damage. Cooldown: {2} Turns
texts.Active_Skill_7_Description: Adds {0}% of Enemy's health to Player's base damage. Cooldown: {1} Turns Uses {2} Mana
texts.Active_Skill_8_Description_Effect: Also heals {0}% of damage dealt by debuffs.
texts.Active_Skill_8_Description_Ultimate: Enemy bleeds, giving you life energy.
texts.Active_Skills_Default: Click Skill Button For More Information
